title.narrative: Resiliency through Wealth, Agriculture, and Nutrition in Karamoja

description.narrative: (Uganda): .This is a Title II development food assistance program implemented in the districts of Napak, Nakapiripirit, Moroto, and Amudat in southern Karamoja. The program has two main objectives: (1) improve availability and access to food; and (2) reduce malnutrition in pregnant and lactating mothers and children under five. The program will reach 270,000 direct beneficiaries over a five-year period. Interventions include: diversifying livelihood assets and opportunities, promoting improved technologies and practices, improving infant and child feeding practices, improving maternal health and nutrition in pregnant and lactating women, enhancing access to clean water/sanitation and improving hygiene practices, and promoting access to local health care...

participating-org.narrative: Agriculture Cooperative Development International/Volunteers in Overseas Cooperative Assistance
